snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo is preparing legislation that would guarantee women in New York the right to late-term abortions, and remove the issue from the state’s penal law.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo is preparing legislation that would guarantee women the right to late-term abortions, and remove the issue from the state’s penal law; move bucks trend in which states have been seeking to restrict abortion, and is part of larger push on women's rights.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo is preparing legislation that would guarantee women in New York the right to late-term abortions, and remove the issue from the state’s penal law.

headline.seo: Cuomo Bucks Tide With Bill to Lift Abortion Limits
headline.main: Cuomo Bucks Tide With Bill to Ease Limits on Abortion
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Bucks Tide With Bill to Ease Abortion Limits
